title: Rule Zero

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Do really bad things to some number of players every once in a while. This sometimes won't work, depending on circumstances.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Immune to stuff
- Can bamboozle undoers
- Players must dance merrily

desc:
Post 1412
*The host has the... "liberty"... of interpreting what should happen in any ambiguous circumstances.*
